title.en: Spectrum of Clarity: The PRISM-2 Refraction

description.ko: 고정밀 PRISM-2 유리를 통과하는 순수한 백색광이 미니멀한 배경 위에서 생생하고 다층적인 무지개 스펙트럼으로 분산되는 매혹적인 시각화입니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing visualization of pure white light passing through a high-precision PRISM-2 glass, dispersing into a vibrant, multi-layered rainbow spectrum against a minimalist background.

prompt: A high-precision triangular glass prism labeled PRISM-2, positioned on a sleek dark surface, a single beam of intense white light hitting the surface and refracting into a brilliant, wide rainbow spectrum, chromatic aberration, sharp focus, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, minimalist aesthetic.
